subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Running
lead_paragraph: More than 24 hours had passed since Usain Bolt’s redefining of the 100 meters, and some are increasingly warning that the record in the 200 meters is on borrowed time.
snippet: More than 24 hours had passed since Usain Bolt’s redefining of the 100 meters, and some are increasingly warning that the record in the 200 meters is on borrowed time.
